1: /* Sigma.go
2:  *
3:  * Compute sum = 1 + 2 + ... + n
4:  */
5: 
6: // variables
<CONST>
<id:n>
<'='>
<integer:10>
7: const n = 10
<VAR>
<id:sum>
<INT>
<'='>
<integer:0>
8: var sum int = 0
<VAR>
<id:index>
<INT>
9: var index int
10:   
11: // main function
<FUNC>
<VOID>
<id:main>
<'('>
<')'>
<'{'>
12: func void main ( ) {
<FOR>
<'('>
<id:index>
<'='>
<integer:0>
<';'>
<id:index>
<'<='>
<id:n>
<';'>
<'}'>
<'{'>
13:   for (index = 0; index <= n; } {
<id:sum>
<'='>
<id:sum>
<'+'>
<id:index>
14:     sum = sum + index
<id:index>
<'='>
<id:index>
<'+'>
<integer:1>
15:     index = index + 1
<'}'>
16:   } 
<PRINT>
<string:The sum is >
17:   print "The sum is "
<PRINTLN>
<id:sum>
18:   println sum
<'}'>
19: }
20: 

Symbol Table:
0	n
1	sum
2	index
3	main
